content: Bank Account Investments Savings DBS Multiplier Insurance Asked by Gabriel ThamAsked on 03 May 2019With the new DBS multiplier upgraded for balances up to $100k, which is the best/lowest cost insurance component to meet that 3rd transaction criteria?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Hariz Arthur Maloy, Independent Financial Advisor at Promiseland IndependentTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Don't bother. Only 1 year of extra bonus. Credit salary, receive dividends from CDP and use your credit card can already.2 comments2

Gabriel Tham03 May 2019Haha dang...thought can hack..credit just spend $1 hack. Maybe can find a cheap plan, once 12 month up, cancel and apply again hahaHariz Arthur Maloy03 May 2019Please don't. Insurance is a long term product. Anything you buy and cancel in one year sure lose money.
